Equipa.profile: Leader, Thinker. Consultant. Teacher. Advanced Program in Project Management (PgC). Mechanical Engineering, Thermodynamics, IST (MSc). Architect of the TBLS business improvement strategy. Founder, architect and teacher of the Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Course.

Consultant with +25 years experience in management across multiple industries (film & entertainment, technology, banking, tourism, media, audiovisual, management consulting), in Portugal, Germany, Spain and Angola.
Business Leader, Lean Six Sigma Black Belt, Project Manager and Continuous Improvement Data Scientist. Sometimes also a bassist and a pianist.
